oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Vicksburg's "The Daily Citizen" newspaper on the eve of the town's fall
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Civil War edition of Vicksburg, Miss.'s "The Daily Citizen" newspaper extolling Gen. Lee's feats in Virginia. Wallpaper backing to this framed copy. The city fell two days after publication of this particular newspaper to Gen. Ulysses S. Grant's forces, a turning point in the Civil War.
